title: Add Student Dashboard with login, notes/test results, and attendance tracking

requirements.text: Create a new StudentDashboard component that serves as a future placeholder section with header 'Student Dashboard (Coming Soon!)' and subtitle 'Access your personalized learning portal' with bilingual support (English and Bengali)
acceptanceCriteria: Component displays 'Student Dashboard (Coming Soon!)' header
Subtitle text is bilingual and uses LanguageContext
Section follows existing design theme (gold/yellow text, dark background, maroon accents)

requirements.text: Display three feature cards in the StudentDashboard component showing 'Login System' (secure student authentication with Internet Identity), 'Notes & Test Results' (view downloadable notes and track test performance), and 'Attendance Record' (monitor class attendance and participation) with icons and descriptions
acceptanceCriteria: Three cards display with appropriate icons (üîê for Login, üìä for Notes & Test Results, üìÖ for Attendance)
Each card shows feature title and brief description
Cards use responsive grid layout (3 columns on desktop, 1 on mobile)
All text content supports bilingual switching

requirements.text: Add a 'Coming Soon' badge or status indicator to the StudentDashboard section to clearly communicate that this feature is in development and not yet available
acceptanceCriteria: Visual badge or tag displays 'Coming Soon' or 'üöß In Development'
Badge styling matches existing design theme
Badge is visible and prominent in the section header

requirements.text: Integrate the StudentDashboard component into App.tsx after the Contact section and before the Footer, maintaining component flow and styling consistency
acceptanceCriteria: StudentDashboard renders in correct position in App.tsx
Component spacing and margins match other sections
No layout breaks or visual inconsistencies

requirements.text: Create backend data models in main.mo for future student dashboard functionality including Student record (id, name, class, enrollmentDate), TestResult record (studentId, subject, testDate, score, maxScore), and AttendanceRecord (studentId, date, present, notes)
acceptanceCriteria: Student type includes id (Text), name (Text), class (Text), enrollmentDate (Int)
TestResult type includes studentId (Text), subject (Text), testDate (Int), score (Nat), maxScore (Nat)
AttendanceRecord type includes studentId (Text), date (Int), present (Bool), notes (optional Text)
Types are defined but CRUD operations are commented out with 'Future implementation' notes

requirements.text: Add placeholder CRUD function signatures in main.mo for student dashboard operations: createStudent, getStudent, addTestResult, getStudentTestResults, recordAttendance, and getStudentAttendance, with function bodies commented out and marked as 'Future implementation'
acceptanceCriteria: Function signatures are present with appropriate parameter and return types
Function bodies are commented out with clear 'TODO: Future implementation' comments
Functions follow existing Motoko patterns in main.mo

constraints: Do not implement actual authentication logic or backend storage for student dashboard features - this is a placeholder for future development
Preserve existing review submission and management functionality in backend/main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, components/ui
nonGoals: Creating actual test result tracking or database
Integrating student dashboard with Internet Identity authentication
Adding admin panel for managing student records
